game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden within the Lost Temple
game.description: Legend has it that the Lost Temple holds the secrets of a long-lost civilization. The artifact is said to grant immense power and wisdom.
game.reward: 1000 gold, +10 reputation with the Archaeologists' Guild

tasks.objective: Gather information about the Lost Temple's location
tasks.description: Speak to the locals and gather rumors about the temple's whereabouts.

tasks.objective: Retrieve a map of the temple's layout
tasks.description: Infiltrate the rival treasure hunter's camp and steal their map.
Solve a series of ancient puzzles to unlock the temple door.
